# Spear Dancer (Feat)
## Overview
You incorporate your two-handed reach weapon into a dizzying martial dance.

**Prerequisites:** [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]] (any two-handed reach weapon), [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] (dance) 4 ranks.

**Benefit:** Each time you hit a creature with a two-handed reach weapon that you have [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]] in, the creature is [[Dazzled|dazzled]] for 1 round.

**Source:** Inner Sea Gods, pg. 216
